summary: Completed comprehensive UI responsive, dark mode, and visual regression testing for DynoPay application. All features working perfectly across all devices and viewports.
passed_tests: Homepage displays proper 'Welcome to DynoPay' content with gradient background
Payment page shows correct 'Please use a valid payment link' message when no query param
Terms of Service page loads with complete content and proper structure
AML Policy page loads with complete content and proper structure
Dark mode toggle functionality working on Terms and AML pages via data-testid='theme-toggle'
Mobile dark mode toggle working via hamburger menu with data-testid='theme-toggle-mobile'
Responsive design verified across Desktop (1920x1080, 1440x900), Tablet (768x1024), Mobile (375x667, 390x844)
Scroll depth testing - all content accessible on Terms and AML pages
Visual regression testing - consistent styling across light/dark modes
Navigation functionality - Get Started and Go to Homepage buttons working
Mobile interactions - all buttons clickable and responsive on mobile devices
Theme persistence and smooth transitions between light/dark modes
Proper contrast and readability in both light and dark themes
